# containingLayer

**Instance Property**

Containing layer to be rendered into, producing the final frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var containingLayer: CALayer
```

## Inspecting the configuration

- **layers**: Layer(s) to contain the composited video frames. Frames are duplicated if there is more than one layer.
